profile: Doors & More Frameless Shower + Railing Ltd has been in business for well over a decade, specializing in custom frameless shower doors, railings, and nothing else. You can find examples of our workmanship in some of the finest retail stores in Ontario. We offer customers a 3 year limited warranty - the best in the industry. Our showers are completely customized for your needs, from single doors to the most intricate design. We also have protective glass separators to help prevent the spread of viruses. for Please visit www.doorsandmore.ca for more information.
service_area:
Toronto, Richmond Hill, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Guelph, Brampton, Markham ...and surrounding cities

profile:
Welcome to Rosales W&D, the purpose of this site is to assist You with finding the perfect product to Affordably Personalize your home.  With over 10 years experience, we can say that we have mastered our craft.  Our products are showcased around the City in residential homes and private estates.  Every year, thousands of clients choose us for their projects mainly because of our professionalism, attention to detail and our one of a kind buying experience which ensures customer satisfaction every time!  And if you're here, it's because you have not yet found what you're looking for.  We believe it's not enough to simply meet your expectations-we must exceed them.

*****
 
We take great pride in our wide variety of Products & Services such as Window Glass Replacements, Glass Shower Enclosures & Partitions, Mirrors, Glass Railings,
Wrought Iron Inserts, Decorative Glass Inserts, Door Systems etc.

*****
Rosales W&D has been servicing Toronto and the surrounding areas for many years.

*****

Rosales W&D
Delivering Quality to Your Home
 
rosaleswd@gmail.com
(416) 456-0937 / (416) 220-1484

profile:
We are a team of professionals specializing in installation of custom glass shower enclosures and other architectural glass. We take pride in our work while ensuring  we provide only high quality glass that is locally fabricated with high quality hardware. 


We specialize in professional installation of custom glass shower enclosures. 

We also offer:

Glass Railings

Glass Office Partitions

Custom Mirrors

Glass Shelves

Glass Table Tops


We provide our customers full assurance with them knowing that all work comes with a one year warranty on installation and a three year warranty on hardware. Along with that, we are a licensed and insured company.

profile:
We have been right here for over 20 years now.  That makes us a very well-established glass company that you can rely upon to be here when you need us.  We are a family owned business by owner, Feroz Yaqoobi.  Feroz has carried the traditions of high skilled custom glass and mirror work for residential and commercial work.  We can boast that most of our glass professionals have been working for us for over a decade.  We work hard to keep our employees happy so we can retain the highest quality workers to perform the services for your projects.
When you want a custom glass project to go smoothly, on-time and made of superior materials, you can trust Glass Build Canada.  We’ve made lots of friends out of our customers by providing them with superior products that last longer and perform better.  Our employees’ workmanship shows in the great attention to detail in our work.
